sentences.en: “Look at them, class. They got it.” He clapped his hands, which caused his toupee to slide to the left. “I told you it was easy.” He smiled.
sentences.cn: “看看他们，同学们，他们学会了。”他拍手称好，不小心让假发滑到了左侧。“我跟你们说过的嘛，很容易，”他笑道。

sentences.en: His toupee dropped off, revealing his bald head.
sentences.cn: 他的假发掉了，露出了光头。

sentences.en: His toupee, obviously fitted many years ago, was slightly off centre and barely covered his spreading baldness.
sentences.cn: 他戴的假发明显是多年以前配的，现在看着有点歪，勉强盖住他日渐扩大的秃顶。

sentences.en: How much did you spend on that bad toupee?
sentences.cn: 你在那个劣质的假发上花了多少钱？

sentences.en: One more thing: While I was writing that last paragraph, the nurse straightened my toupee.
sentences.cn: 还有件事: 我写最后一段的时候, 护士正了正我的假发.

sentences.en: When he grew bald he bought a toupee.
sentences.cn: 头发掉了后,他买了一顶假发.

trans.tran_en: A toupee is a piece of artificial hair worn by a man to cover a patch on his head where he has lost his hair
